subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The eight-time Olympic field-hockey champion India will not be at the Beijing Games, the first time in 80 years it failed to qualify for the competition. India’s hopes of making the Olympics ended Sunday with a 2-0 loss to Britain in the final of a qualifying event in Chile, prompting criticism from former players.
